meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jason Sterlacci Lilly Chin Tim Aten Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7627.

td.p: Jason Sterlacci, a fourth grade teacher from Somerset, New Jersey
Lilly Chin, a robotics Ph.D. student at MIT from Decatur, Georgia
Tim Aten, an editor from Vermilion, Ohio

tr.td: DR. JOHNSON'S ALPHABET
(Alex: We're going back to his 1755 dictionary.)
"B" A SPORT
U.S.A.
THAT'S OUR COLOR
(Alex: You have to name the color that has a shade that's been trademarked by the group mentioned.)
TINDER
SWIPE WRITE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'It "is called the canine letter, because it is uttered with some resemblance to the growl or snarl of a cur"')
